about_the_game:
Starry Monogatari official app now available on PC!

Let's meet various people in the world of Staｍono and feel the star-colored story!

Playable content

Main story: You can feel the adventure and school life in 12 stories for each school (stories will be updated sequentially, and many schools that support stories will be added!)
Side story: You can feel the daily life between three characters (the story will be updated sequentially)
Event story: You can experience a special story for a limited time (even after the period ends, the content may be transferred to a side story)

Novel: You can feel the story of Stamono with pure text, without complicated expressions such as illustrations.

Songs: You can listen to various official songs such as Stamono theme songs, school theme songs, etc. for free! (Some charges apply)

Worldview: Check out Stamono's worldview(Some images and world views will be updated in the future)

Popular Voice Actors

Shindo Amane
Watase Yuzuki
Date Sayuri
Suzuhara Nozomi
Isobe Karin
Harada Sayaka
Okuma Wakana
Tsukine Kona
etc.

*This program will be able to link data with the mobile version at a later date. Specific steps will be released at a later date
*Note: All character voices and official songs are only available in Japan.

We plan to add a lot of mini-games and features, so please look forward to it!
detailed_description:
Starry Monogatari official app now available on PC!

Let's meet various people in the world of Staｍono and feel the star-colored story!

Playable content

Main story: You can feel the adventure and school life in 12 stories for each school (stories will be updated sequentially, and many schools that support stories will be added!)
Side story: You can feel the daily life between three characters (the story will be updated sequentially)
Event story: You can experience a special story for a limited time (even after the period ends, the content may be transferred to a side story)

Novel: You can feel the story of Stamono with pure text, without complicated expressions such as illustrations.

Songs: You can listen to various official songs such as Stamono theme songs, school theme songs, etc. for free! (Some charges apply)

Worldview: Check out Stamono's worldview(Some images and world views will be updated in the future)

Popular Voice Actors

Shindo Amane
Watase Yuzuki
Date Sayuri
Suzuhara Nozomi
Isobe Karin
Harada Sayaka
Okuma Wakana
Tsukine Kona
etc.

*This program will be able to link data with the mobile version at a later date. Specific steps will be released at a later date
*Note: All character voices and official songs are only available in Japan.

We plan to add a lot of mini-games and features, so please look forward to it!
developers: Shanghai Akari Cultural Technology Co., Ltd
name: StarryMonogatari: Student's Terminal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6300HQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

publishers: Shanghai Akari Cultural Technology Co., Ltd
short_description: Starry Monogatari official app now available on PC! Let's meet various people in the world of Staｍono and feel the star-colored story!
